title: India has already decided that all Khalastanis deserve to die, it's alright, Understandable opinion BUT WHY CREATE FALSE REASONS.... ISN'T BEING KHALASTANI REASON ENOUGH???
selftext:
https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/waris-punjab-de-chief-s-brother-in-law-named-primary-accused-in-attack-on-indian-high-commission-in-canada-101687549686353-amp.html

^ why does India print false news like Grenade Attack on Ottawa Indian High Consulate. 

Or San Francisco, Indian High Consulate arson. False news. 

Or Sydney Targeted attacks on Hindus. False news. 

Or Mandir Vandalizations in Brampton, Mississauga, Sydney etc.  or which it's highly likely that Indians themselves were behind it. Haryana guy caught in CCTV once, Gujaratis caught with Spraycans once in Sydney. 



Why stupid & false statements like paxtan connection, yeh connection voh connection..... When being Khalastani is enough to justify killing why DO YOU PEOPLE TELL LIES?????? 


I'm not justifying anything, I know India belongs to Hindus.... And all others deserve to die. It's established. 

But why justify it with lies when you know that you're right.
